content.question: Consider the functions <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 10 open parentheses x minus 1 close parentheses plus log subscript 10 open parentheses x plus 3 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>-</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals log subscript 10 open parentheses x plus 9 close parentheses"><semantics><mrow><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>log</mi><mn>10</mn></msub><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>9</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, what are all <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-coordinates of the points of intersection of the graphs of <math alttext="f"><semantics><mi>f</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="g"><semantics><mi>g</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> ?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="x equals negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals 3"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

​<math alttext="x equals negative 7"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="x equals negative 4"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>

topic.text: 2.13: Exponential and Logarithmic Equations and Inequalities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Solve equations and inequalities represented analytically, with and without technology.
